description: Million bells, also known as Calibrachoa, is an amazing flowering annual that can easily brighten up your living space. With trumpet-shaped flowers that range in shades of blue, pink, yellow, and more, these blooms will entice butterflies and hummingbirds alike to take a break in your garden and enjoy the beauty of these petite beauties. Despite their small size, the masses of flowers they produce will create a fully-density of lovely blooms that will last throughout the summer season. Requiring minimal effort to get it established, this species is a great choice for gardeners of all levels.
